channel.title: Mysql Command-Line Client
channel.description:
Hello,
This is probably a stupid question, so apologies if it is.
I use two tools for server administration, SSH, and also the mysql command-line client. When using the Whonix workstation, are but of these tools suing Tor? How can I be sure that the connection to a mysql database from the Whonix terminal is over Tor? Like wise with SSH?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Mysql Command-Line Client
item.dc:creator: noobee
item.description:
Thanks Patrick, I thought it was a silly question, but it’s good to be re-assured!

Read full topic

item.title: Mysql Command-Line Client
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Everything from the workstation always must go through Tor first. No way to circumvent it. And if there was - there was never one yet in Whonix’s history - then it would be a grave bug.

Read full topic
